pkgmetadata.longdescription: NetM훮gus Python Package=======================This Python package is to be used with the `NetM훮gus <http://www.intelligentvisibility.com/netmagus>`_ product from `Intelligent Visbility, Inc <http://www.intelligentvisibility.com>`_.It is used to create and exchange UI forms and Formula steps with the NetM훮gus application.The code has been tested and should work for both Python 3.6+.Refer to the `NetM훮gus <http://www.intelligentvisibility.com/netmagus>`_ documentation for usage details.To install: ``pip install netmagus``
